title.rendered: Game Rescheduled: Shaker at Saratoga Springs Football

content.rendered:
The game has been rescheduled for Saturday, October 26th at 3:00 PM, beginning with the second half. No additional admission fee will be charged.

We would like to address the unexpected power outage that occurred during the Shaker vs. Saratoga Springs high school football game on October 25th. We understand this situation caused confusion and concern among our players, fans, and families. First and foremost, we are grateful for the patience and understanding shown by everyone during this unforeseen event. The safety of our students and attendees is always our top priority. As soon as we recognized the issue, our staff took immediate action to assess the situation and ensure that everyone was safe.

We are currently working with our utility provider to understand the cause of the outage and to prevent similar occurrences in the future. We are committed to ensuring that all future events run smoothly and that our facilities remain safe and welcoming for our students and the community.

Thank you for your support!
